explanation: The majority of opinions indicate bullish sentiment with ongoing long positions, expectations of upward moves, and strong support levels holding around 106k-107k. Despite some mentions of shorting at the top and minor bearish comments, positive momentum and repeated buy/hold recommendations dominate. Several users mention holding or buying, expecting pump to ATH, and even algorithmic buy signals. Negative opinions about confidence are present but outnumbered by the positive outlook and active participation in longs.
